entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clyde River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Near blizzard developing early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
